author: A_Brickset_user
title: Neat helicopter design
review: This was a tough set to get - it came in a multipack with a Castle wagon and a space set, I believe.  I like this helicopter's design - the red side tanks and the reinforced tail boom.  That sets it apart from the other Lego helicopters out there.

author: AETerry
title: Flycracker Helicopter
review:
This to me is by far one of the best Helicopter builds that Lego's done that I've come across.

 

It comes as part of a Value Pack with two other sets. There's a minifigure pilot, a bright contrast of colors that's easy to build and doesn't look too clunky. There's a pair of lights underneath the helicopter that suggest this could be used at night as part of a search and rescue or for night time landing. Finalizing the set is a small little tool rack with a wrench, welding tool and an oil drum.
